alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued June 04 at 2:58PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MDT SUNDAY... The New Mexico Departments of Health and Environment has issued an Air Quality Alert, until 1 PM MDT Sunday. An Air Quality Alert for Smoke has been issued. * WHAT... Localized areas of unhealthy air quality will continue for areas near the Black fire in the Gila National Forest. New and residual smoke here will be transported toward the east later today and into the evening with less impacts with westward extent. Outside the immediate Black fire area, smoke impacts in the state are not expected to be widespread or significant. * WHERE... Significant impacts will be localized across western Socorro, Catron, northeast Grant, and far western Sierra counties. More details on impacted locations and latest air quality information can be found at https://fire.airnow.gov * WHEN... Remainder of this afternoon through at least 1pm MDT Sunday, June 5.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Sierra County Lakes; Southern Gila Foothills, Mimbres Valley; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
